entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is mentioned as one of the students who drinks from a glass, and his glass turns a dark, murky brown color.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Goyle is mentioned as one of the students who drinks from a glass, and his glass turns the khaki colour of a bogey.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as cautioning Ron and Hermione not to drink their glasses in the current location.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as reaching for his glass along with Hermione, but Harry cautions them against drinking it in the current location.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as reaching for her glass along with Ron, but Harry cautions them against drinking it in the current location.

relationships.description: Both Crabbe and Goyle's glasses turn different colors after drinking from them, indicating a similar effect.
Harry cautions Ron against drinking his glass in the current location.
Harry also cautions Hermione against drinking her glass in the current location.
